title.rendered: Four Reasons to invest in Juvas LED Surface Panel Lights

content.rendered:
In modern times, we have developed an inclination of decorating our living spaces with a clear focus on ceiling enhancement. Surface Panel lights intensify the features in the room and add glamour to the ambiance. Be it any occasion, festival, get-together, house-party, corporate office decoration, workspace styling, surface panel lights have a significant role in imparting an appealing and aesthetic aspect to it.

So, let’s look at 4 reasons that justify the need to invest in Juvas LED Surface Panel lights

1) Excellent Performance

Juvas LED Surface Panel lights are energy-efficient by nature and deliver high-quality illumination to our rooms. It highlights the interior of the room and adds a shine to its décor. These LED Surface Panel lights are easy to install and safe to use. It’s an unique combination of style and efficiency that makes these lights special. These lights provide visual comfort and are extremely soothing. The High-Performance Electronic Driver ensures zero maintenance. It has a highly efficient diffuser for glare-free and uniform light distribution.

2) Long life and Wide Application

Juvas LED Surface Panel lights are skillfully crafted to provide illumination in high as well as low ceiling areas. It has a life expectancy better than the conventional lights available in the market. Moreover, Juvas LED Surface Panel lights exhibit sheer elegance and can be the centre of attraction in a room if properly placed. It can be used to brighten up Airport Lounges, Corporate Offices, Bank & ATM Outlets, IT Centres, Modern WorkSpaces, Households, Hospital Premises, etc.

3) A Wide Range To Choose From

The beauty of Juvas LED Surface Panel lights is available in various forms to select from. There is a Slim Panel available in 7 types of System Powers. There are Ultra-Slim Panel and Ultra-Slim Surface Mounted Panel, each available in 4 types of system power. There is also Surface Mounted Panel available in 3 types of system power. In addition to these, we have an exclusive series of LED Down Lighter and Commercial lights to choose from.

4) Environment Friendly

Apart from being durable and energy-efficient, Juvas LED Surface Panel lights are eco-friendly by nature. These panel lights are safe to use as they are free from harmful UV & IR radiation. Moreover, Juvas Panel lights do not contain harmful Mercury. It’s absolutely safe and designed with an objective to create a toxic-free environment.

So, brighten up your rooms with Juvas LED Surface Panel lights and give a sophisticated and fashionable appearance to your ceiling.
